title: Setup distribution and installation infrastructure
description: Create Homebrew formula with comprehensive metadata and testing. Build direct installation script with architecture detection and verification. Establish multi-platform binary distribution with proper checksums.

title: Establish Rust project infrastructure with KIND patterns
description: Initialize comprehensive Rust project with modular structure following KIND's architecture patterns. Set up workspace configuration, module organization, and type-safe provider abstraction foundation for Apple Container integration.

title: Create documentation ecosystem and migration resources
description: Build documentation website with search and navigation. Create detailed KIND-to-KINA migration guide with command compatibility matrix and performance comparisons. Develop comprehensive troubleshooting and contributor guidelines.

title: Implement comprehensive error handling and recovery
description: Build ErrorRecoverySystem with intelligent retry strategies for transient failures. Implement CleanupManager ensuring resource cleanup in all failure modes. Enhance error reporting with diagnostic information and actionable troubleshooting.

title: Implement core CLI commands (create/delete/get/export)
description: Implement operational CLI commands (kina create cluster, delete cluster, get clusters/nodes, export kubeconfig, load container-image, build node-image) with KIND-compatible argument parsing and status reporting.

title: Support complex multi-node cluster topologies
description: Implement MultiNodeOrchestrator supporting custom node roles, high-availability control plane (3/5/7 nodes) with validation, worker node scaling, and complex networking topologies with coordinated creation sequencing.

title: Design provider abstraction layer and CLI framework
description: Design trait-based provider abstraction following KIND's provider pattern with complete interface definition. Implement CLI framework with clap-based command parsing, KIND-compatible command structure, and YAML configuration file support.

title: Implement phased cluster lifecycle management
description: Implement ClusterLifecycle with KIND's sequential action pattern (Validate, Provision, Configure, Bootstrap, Join). Create ActionPipeline architecture supporting extensible workflow execution with CleanupGuard for automatic resource cleanup on failure.

title: Add Nushell CI scripts and local GitHub Actions testing with act
description: Replace shell-based mise ci task with Nushell scripts for structured output and better error reporting. Create mise ci (for GitHub Actions) and mise ci-local (for local dev loop) tasks using Nushell. Setup act with colima for local GitHub Actions testing so local and CI pipelines stay in sync. Reference implementation: /Users/vinnie/github/nnqr/mise.toml. Key patterns: act as mise tool, colima via mise exec lima@latest colima@latest, Nushell #!/usr/bin/env nu scripts with OS detection, test:action tasks for pr/push workflows, gitleaks scanning with Apple Container/colima/docker runtimes. Includes: GitHub Actions workflow, Nushell CI scripts, act/colima configuration, beads as mise tool.

title: Implement Apple Container provider with KIND patterns
description: Implement complete AppleContainerProvider trait with container lifecycle operations (create, start, stop, delete), network management, and container labeling system for cluster identification. Include concurrent container creation and proper error handling.

title: Build production monitoring and observability
description: Implement ObservabilitySystem with structured logging, metrics collection for all major operations. Build HealthChecker for system and cluster health validation. Create DiagnosticTools for automated troubleshooting with log analysis.

title: Establish community governance and support infrastructure
description: Define project governance model with clear roles and RFC decision-making process. Establish support channels (GitHub Issues, Discussions) with response expectations. Create contribution guidelines with development environment setup.

title: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides
description: Generate user guide, installation guide, troubleshooting guide, performance guide, developer guide, API reference, and complete example library covering all major use cases.

title: Build comprehensive testing suite (unit/integration/E2E)
description: Achieve >80% unit test coverage with mockable ContainerProvider. Implement integration tests validating Apple Container interactions. Create E2E test suite covering complete workflows, KIND compatibility validation, and performance regression tests.

title: Fix apple_provider.rs Docker-compat CLI calls for Apple Container 0.5.0
description:
apple_provider.rs uses Docker-style CLI patterns not supported by Apple Container 0.5.0:
- Lines 135/340/394/673: Go template --format (e.g. {{.Name}}, {{.ID}}) — replace with --format json + Rust-side parsing
- Lines 392/671: --filter label=... — replace with list + Rust-side filtering
- Line 462: 'rm -f' — replace with 'delete --force'
- Lines 760-762: 'network rm' — replace with 'network delete'
- Line 94: Remove podman/docker fallback from CLI detection, only detect Apple Container

title: Replace docker save with container image save for image loading
description: apple_container.rs line 937 uses 'docker save' to export images before loading into cluster nodes. Replace with 'container image save' (available in Apple Container 0.5.0). This removes the hard dependency on Docker being installed alongside Apple Container. Also update error messages referencing 'docker save'.

title: Optimize performance and implement benchmarking
description: Build PerformanceOptimizer achieving KIND-competitive cluster creation (within 20%). Implement CacheManager with intelligent caching and image preloading. Create benchmark suite comparing against KIND baselines.

title: Update container CLI commands for Apple Container 0.5.0
description: Replace deprecated 'container images' commands with 'container image' in mise.toml (4 instances) and kina-cli/images/build-node-image.sh (2 instances). Migration from Apple Container 0.4.x to 0.5.0.

title: Implement automated release pipeline
description: Build GitHub Actions release workflow with multi-architecture builds (Intel/Apple Silicon) and code signing. Automate release artifact generation with checksums, Homebrew formula updates, and changelog generation.

title: Execute public launch with community monitoring
description: Publish GitHub announcement and multi-channel outreach. Implement launch monitoring tracking installation success rates (target >95%), user feedback, and issue trends. Establish responsive early-adopter support and feedback collection.

title: Complete Apple Container research and feasibility assessment
description: Conduct comprehensive research on Apple Container capabilities including lifecycle management, networking, volume mounting, privilege model, and image management. Deliver GO/NO-GO decision on project viability with detailed capability assessment.

title: Integrate Kubernetes bootstrap and multi-node orchestration
description: Implement KubeadmInitAction for control plane initialization with config generation. Add CNI plugin installation, storage provisioner setup, and KubeadmJoinAction supporting sequential control plane joining and concurrent worker node joining.

title: Implement node image building system
description: Build NodeImageBuilder supporting kina build node-image with Kubernetes version selection, custom configurations, and multi-architecture support. Implement BuildCache for efficient incremental builds with layer optimization.

title: Implement advanced cluster configuration and customization
description: Support kubeadm config patches, advanced networking (IPv6, custom subnets), feature gates, custom volume mounts, and environment variables. Add comprehensive configuration validation with security constraints.

title: Add advanced networking and load balancer support
description: Implement LoadBalancerAction for multi-control-plane clusters using HAProxy. Add IngressControllerAction supporting nginx-ingress, port forwarding, service exposure, and advanced CNI plugin selection.

title: Enhance CLI with advanced UX features
description: Add verbose/debug output modes with structured logging, progress indicators for long-running operations, enhanced error messages with troubleshooting suggestions, and shell completion support (bash/zsh/fish).

title: Remove .claudio directory and claudio submodule
description: Remove the .claudio/ planning directory and the claudio/ git submodule (vinnie357/claudio). Clean up .gitmodules. Project is migrating to beads for task tracking.

title: Add Apple Container version detection and minimum version check
description: Add version detection at startup to validate Apple Container 0.5.0+ is installed. Use 'container system version' to parse the version. Surface the detected version in 'kina version' output. Fail with a clear error message if < 0.5.0 is detected, listing the breaking changes. Consider adding a minimum_version field to AppleContainerConfig.

title: Update CLAUDE.md to remove claudio agent references
description: CLAUDE.md references .claudio agent system, claudio directory, and claudio-based workflows. Update to reflect beads-based task tracking and remove stale claudio references.

title: Setup development environment and quality tools
description: Configure mise.toml with complete development environment, integrate rustfmt/clippy/cargo-audit, establish pre-commit hooks, and set up testing framework with unit test utilities and mock implementations for Apple Container operations.

title: Clean up mise.toml: extract scripts, prune unused tasks, rename to colon-separated namespaces
description:
mise.toml is too long and uses inconsistent naming. Clean up:

1. **Extract inline scripts to scripts/**: Move lengthy nu/bash run blocks into standalone scripts in scripts/ directory
2. **Prune unused tasks**: Remove any tasks that are no longer relevant
3. **Rename demo tasks to test:int namespace**: demo-cluster → test:int:cluster, demo-test → test:int:validate, demo-cleanup → test:int:cleanup
4. **Rust test suites under test namespace**: Ensure cargo test tasks use test: prefix (test:unit, test:cli, etc.)
5. **Use colon separators consistently**: Replace all hyphen-separated task names with colon-separated (e.g., container-check → container:check, demo-cluster → test:int:cluster)
6. **Keep kina:use as-is**: Already uses colon separator

Acceptance criteria:
- mise.toml is significantly shorter (inline scripts moved to scripts/)
- All task names use colon separators
- Demo tasks live under test:int: namespace
- Rust test tasks live under test: namespace
- mise run ci still works
- All extracted scripts are executable and tested

title: Integrate Kubernetes ecosystem tools (kubectx/kubens/k9s)
description: Build KubernetesToolManager for kubectx, kubens, k9s detection and integration. Implement automated kubeconfig management for tool compatibility, validation with installation guidance, and integration testing.

title: Execute pre-launch validation and quality assurance
description: Run comprehensive launch validation across all supported macOS versions and architectures. Validate KIND compatibility with detailed compatibility matrix. Execute pre-launch checklist covering installation, functionality, performance, security, and docs.

title: Implement security hardening and container security
description: Build SecurityHardeningSystem with container security policies, secure credential handling using macOS Keychain, and vulnerability detection. Implement SecurityPolicyManager applying Pod Security Standards, network policies, and RBAC.

title: Implement container image and network management
description: Build ImageManager with pull/cache/load capabilities for node images. Implement NetworkManager with cluster-specific network creation and cleanup, and container image loading to cluster nodes with parallel execution support.
